Pre-Game Insights: Hungary will look to record their first win of the 2024/25 Nations League campaign when they welcome the Netherlands to the Puskás Aréna.
Hungary have started this new campaign in awful fashion, being thumped 5-0 by Germany and drawing 0-0 against Bosnia & Herzegovina.
This fixture against the Netherlands could threaten Hungary's unbeaten home record as they have lost the last nine head-to-head meetings between both sides.
The Netherlands have made a solid start to this Nations League campaign, securing a 5-2 win over Bosnia and a 2-2 draw with Germany.
The Netherlands are favoured by the bookies to get the three points in Hungary, with their record of just two losses in their last 12 away matches.
